author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1661476, make not-present nodes in WORKING show up in svn
info as depth excluded and kind unknown.
Not showing them is similar to how we handle this status in BASE, but these
nodes are visible in 'svn status' as a DELETE, so we should provide some
info, instead of the 'doesn't exist' introduced in r1661479.

author: rhuijben
msg: Minor tweaks in the patch code to avoid a cast warning and to avoid a db query.
(obtain_eol_and_keywords_for_file): Don't use two db queries when one
(get_hunk_info): Use special linenumber type as argument to avoid warning.
